fixes.name: "Número de cédula:","Marca temporal","Dirección de correo electrónico","Nombres y apellidos:","Identidad de género:","Dirección - División 2
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR textValue = 'TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'["Número de cédula:","Marca temporal","Dirección de correo electrónico","Nombres y apellidos:","Identidad de género:","Dirección]
VAR firstComma = SEARCH(",", textValue, 1, 0)
VAR secondComma = SEARCH(",", textValue, firstComma + 1, 0)
VAR result = TRIM(MID(textValue, firstComma + 1, secondComma - firstComma - 1))
RETURN result
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau TRIM(SPLIT(..., ",", 2)) with row-level DAX using SEARCH to find comma positions and MID to extract the second segment, then TRIM the result. Kept the original column reference format mapped to 'Table'[Column].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation performs row-level string manipulation (splitting/trimming a single field) without any aggregation or parameters, so it should be a calculated column.
